page.title: 07Smisby - the oldest village
page.content:
Smisby is the oldest development in our area .The village has developed over the centuries.Most of the homes are large detached three storey buildings or cottages.The people who live in these houses own them. There has been council development in Smisby since the 2nd World War.These are mostly semi_detached houses on a small estate,built with brick.The houses have very small gardens.
After the 2nd World War many people in big towns were homeless,so a lot of housing development took place .The Goseley Estate was built near Hartshorn.The houses on the estate are semi_detached and terraced.They are built of brick and timber boarding.They have very small or no gardens. (next page)
